headline: Dominion Energy Charitable Foundation Fall Grant Cycle Now Open
summary: RICHMOND, Va., August 04, 2025--Nonprofit organizations within Dominion Energy's service areas are invited to apply for grants from the Dominion Energy Charitable Foundation.

headline: Dominion Energy Sees Q2 Profit Surge
summary: Dominion Energy reports $0.88 GAAP EPS in Q2 2025, up 38% year-over-year, and maintains full-year guidance.
